channel.title: abiotic stress response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in abiotic stress response on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaWDP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWDP1 Gene Name: WPP Domain Protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The Pepper WPP Domain Protein, CaWDP1, Acts as a Novel Negative Regulator of Drought Stress via ABA Signaling.

item.title: CiMYB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiMYB3 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transciption factor 5 Genome: Species: Cichorium intybus Functional Descriptions: Chicory R2R3-MYB transcription factors CiMYB5 and CiMYB3 regulate fructan 1-exohydrolase expression in response to abiotic stress and hormonal cues.

item.title: CiMYB5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiMYB5 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transciption factor 5 Genome: Species: Cichorium intybus Functional Descriptions: Chicory R2R3-MYB transcription factors CiMYB5 and CiMYB3 regulate fructan 1-exohydrolase expression in response to abiotic stress and hormonal cues.

item.title: CmLOX08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C011885 Gene Symbol: CmLOX08 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 8 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Cloned the CmLOX08 promoter of melon (Cucumis melo) and identified the main promoter regions regulating transcription in response to signalling molecules and abiotic stresses.

item.title: CsWAX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa020530 Gene Symbol: CsWAX2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber Genome Database (http://cucumber.

item.title: GhHSP24.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHSP24.7 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The regulation circuit composed of GhHSP24.

item.title: GhMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK5 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase5 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhMKK5 affects disease resistance, induces HR-like cell death, and reduces the tolerance to salt and drought stress in transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmWRKY54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10g011300 Gene Symbol: GmWRKY54 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmWRKY54 improves drought tolerance through activating genes in abscisic acid and Ca2+ signaling pathways in transgenic soybean.

item.title: HvRAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvRAF Gene Name: root abundant factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley ERF-type transcription factor HvRAF confers enhanced pathogen resistance and salt tolerance in Arabidopsis.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Itr_sc000462.1_g00010.1 Gene Symbol: IbNAC087 Gene Name: Genome: Sweetpotato GARDEN (Sweetpotato Genome and Resource Database ENtry) (http://sweetpotato-garden.

item.title: JrVHAG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrVHAG1 Gene Name: vacuolar H+-ATPase G 1 Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrVHAG1 is involved in plant abiotic strss response.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD11G1303400 Gene Symbol: MdATG18a Gene Name: Genome: Malus Ã— domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MtST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g069810 Gene Symbol: MtST1 Gene Name: Specific Tissue 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Three members of Medicago truncatula ST family are ubiquitous during development and modulated by nutritional status (MtST1) and dehydration (MtST2 and MtST3).

item.title: MtST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g116440 Gene Symbol: MtST2 Gene Name: Specific Tissue 2 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Three members of Medicago truncatula ST family are ubiquitous during development and modulated by nutritional status (MtST1) and dehydration (MtST2 and MtST3).

item.title: MtST3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g116430 Gene Symbol: MtST3 Gene Name: Specific Tissue 3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Three members of Medicago truncatula ST family are ubiquitous during development and modulated by nutritional status (MtST1) and dehydration (MtST2 and MtST3).

item.title: NtCP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP1 Gene Name: cysteine protease 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP1 encoding a C-terminus partial sequence of a putative tobacco cysteine proteinase gene whereas the 1300 bp fragment (NtCP2) is a full-length cysteine proteinase.

item.title: NtCP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP2 Gene Name: cysteine protease 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP2 has a high similarity to KDEL-tailed cysteine proteinases and is expressed in mature green leaves.

item.title: TaGBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat TaGBF1 gene is involved in the blue-light response and salt tolerance.

item.title: TaHsfA6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G276500 Gene Symbol: TaHsfA6b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of wheat transcription factor (TaHsfA6b) provides thermotolerance in barley.

item.title: TaOPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaOPR1 Gene Name: Oxophytodienoate Reductase 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat Oxophytodienoate Reductase Gene TaOPR1 Confers Salinity Tolerance via Enhancement of Abscisic Acid Signaling and Reactive Oxygen Species Scavenging.

item.title: TaSnRK2.10-4A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4A02G235600.2 Gene Symbol: TaSnRK2.10-4A Gene Name: Sucrose non-fermenting 1-related protein kinase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Sucrose non-fermenting 1-related protein kinase 2 (SnRK2) acts as a signaling hub in the response to drought stress, but whether SnRK2 helps plants cope with water deficit via other mechanisms is largely unknown.
